The word is that the American executives behind the launch of Simon Cowell 's X Factor US are not convinced that Cheryl Cole is well enough known among the show's potential core audience. It was thought the American job was a done deal but it seems the US executives have had a last-minute change of heart. They are now questioning whether she's famous enough in America.
